EmailTemplate.name: WO 12 hours after moved to 03 - WFA and WO priority not critical or high
EmailTemplate.subject: CRITICAL Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 12 hours since moved to 03 - Proof Sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
It's been 12 hours since the mockup for Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} was sent to the customer and we haven't received approval. Please follow up with {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} to avoid delays.
URGENT: This Invoice is marked as Critical. Delays in mockup approval will delay the order.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
